south.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: the direction that is at the bottom of a map of the world, below the Equator. It is on the right if you are facing the rising sun
south.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: By now, the army was approaching from the south.
Gatwick airport is a few miles to the south of London.
south.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: in the south, or facing the south
south.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: a village on the south coast
I am currently teaching in south Texas.
south.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: a south wind comes from the south
south.translation[2].definitions[0].exam: Most of the birds had already flown south.
a seaside town 99 km south of London
